name: Sparky's Hunt 2
description:
Following the events of your horrifying experience of Sparky and her followers, you decide to sell your old home and move to a new location.  Little do you realise that she has followed you and has learned from her previous errors.  She is going to get you if you don't hide and try to stop her.

If you are not familiar with the previous story 'Sparky's Hunt'.  The free demo is available: http://gamejolt.com/games/sparky-s-hunt/171774 or full game is for sale on steam.

This game was originally on Greenlight but I decided to release it for free to conclude the Sparky story.  This is an updated demo to check for bugs and errors.

- Hide across the house to avoid Sparky finding you.  If she sees you, run...hide and pray.

- Each character has an enchanted sphere controlling their power, find them and contain it to complete the levels.

- Keep your homes power supply charged to avoid the lights going out.  If the power fails charge the terminal before she catches you.

- Easter eggs available in demo only.
